page.title: 18A DAY IN THE LIFE OF
page.content: I am 8 years old. On a normal day I would wake up and get dressed. Then I would have my breakfast, do my teeth and wash. After that I would pack my bag with an apron, P.E. kit and slippers. If I have any time then I play. Then I go to school. I go to John Selden First School. The school doors open at ten to nine. Often I do a picture . After that we go to an assembly. After the assembly we do a story or a sheet of number work. At twenty-five to eleven we go to play and at ten to eleven we come in form play. We have milk and carry on with our work. At twelve o'clock we go out to play again. That play ends at half-past twelve. Once we come in we have lunch. When we finish lunch we wait until it is quarter to one then we go out to play again until one.
